metadata.name: Rclone Config File Creation
metadata.comment: Detects Rclone config files being created

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(file.path), lower(':\\users\\')) AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\.config\\rclone\\')))

output.summary: Detects Rclone config files being created

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate Rclone usage Reference: https://research.nccgroup.com/2021/05/27/detecting-rclone-an-effective-tool-for-exfiltration/
